languages.text: "Дай вам, шестеренкам, волю, уже бы все кабаки перестроили в цеха и всю станцию переделали в сервиторов!"
"If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
languages.original_text: "Дай вам, шестеренкам, волю, уже бы все кабаки перестроили в цеха и всю станцию переделали в сервиторов!"

traits.locale_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果这个地方由你说了算，齿轮人，那恐怕所有酒馆都会被改造成车间，星站上的每个人都会被改造成机仆！”
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: “如果这个地方由你说了算，齿轮人，那恐怕所有酒馆都会被改造成车间，星站上的每个人都会被改造成奴工！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Si por ti fuera, todas las tabernas se habrían convertido en talleres y todos los habitantes de la estación en servidores!».
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Si por ti fuera, todas las tabernas se habrían convertido en talleres y todos los habitantes de la estación en servidores!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「歯車さん、あなたの言う通りなら、あらゆる酒場はとっくに作業場になって、皆がステーションでサーヴィターとして働いているでしょうね！」
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: 「歯車さん、あなたの言う通りなら、あらゆる酒場はとっくに作業場になって、皆がステーションでサーヴィターとして働いているでしょうね！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ginge es nach Euch Cogs, wären alle Tavernen längst Werkstätten und alle Bewohner der Station Servitoren!"
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: "Ginge es nach Euch Cogs, wären alle Tavernen längst Werkstätten und alle Bewohner der Station Servitoren!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Si on vous écoutait, tête de boulon, toutes les tavernes auraient depuis longtemps été converties en ateliers, et tous les habitants de la station en servitors ! »
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: « Si on vous écoutait, tête de boulon, toutes les tavernes auraient depuis longtemps été converties en ateliers, et tous les habitants de la station en servitors ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Dişli, eğer sen her istediğini yapıyor olsaydın bütün hanlar çoktan atölyelere, istasyondaki herkes de hizmetörlere dönüşmüştü!"
languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"

traits.locale_text: "Dişli, eğer sen her istediğini yapıyor olsaydın bütün hanlar çoktan atölyelere, istasyondaki herkes de servitörlere dönüşmüştü!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you had your way, cogs, all the taverns would have long since been turned into workshops and everyone on the station into servitors!"
